mapper.update: update route set city_ID = #{cityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, province_ID = #{provinceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, route_Name = #{routeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sart_province = #{sartProvince,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_City = #{startCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, end_province = #{endProvince,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, end_city = #{endCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mid_province = #{midProvince,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mid_City = #{midCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, transpor_price = #{transporPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Comments = #{comments,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where route_ID = #{routeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select route_ID, city_ID, province_ID, route_Name, sart_province, start_City, end_province, end_city, mid_province, mid_City, transpor_price, Comments from route where route_ID = #{routeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select route_ID, city_ID, province_ID, route_Name, sart_province, start_City, end_province, end_city, mid_province, mid_City, transpor_price, Comments from route
